rules_text:
Mill three cards. When you do, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Overcoalesce {6}{G}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{G}{U}. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of ‘target' with ‘each'. It enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
